oml:data_set_description.oml:name: pyrim
oml:data_set_description.oml:description:
**Author**: **Source**: Unknown - **Please cite**:
The task consists of Learning Quantitative Structure Activity Relationships (QSARs). The Inhibition of Dihydrofolate Reductase by Pyrimidines.The data are described in: King, Ross .D., Muggleton, Steven., Lewis, Richard. and Sternberg, Michael.J.E. Drug Design by machine learning: the use of inductive logic programming to model the structure-activity relationships of trimethoprim analogues binding to dihydrofolate reductase.
Original source: ?. Source: collection of regression datasets by Luis Torgo (ltorgo@ncc.up.pt) at http://www.ncc.up.pt/~ltorgo/Regression/DataSets.html Characteristics: 74 cases; 28 continuous variables
